views.name: v_financial_performance_by_type
views.definition: select `DigiERP_LeHuy_Dev2`.`invoices`.`type` AS `type`,`DigiERP_LeHuy_Dev2`.`invoices`.`status` AS `status`,count(0) AS `invoice_count`,sum(`DigiERP_LeHuy_Dev2`.`invoices`.`total_amount`) AS `total_amount`,sum(`DigiERP_LeHuy_Dev2`.`invoices`.`paid_amount`) AS `total_paid`,sum(`DigiERP_LeHuy_Dev2`.`invoices`.`balance_amount`) AS `total_balance`,avg(`DigiERP_LeHuy_Dev2`.`invoices`.`total_amount`) AS `avg_invoice_amount` from `DigiERP_LeHuy_Dev2`.`invoices` group by `DigiERP_LeHuy_Dev2`.`invoices`.`type`,`DigiERP_LeHuy_Dev2`.`invoices`.`status` order by `DigiERP_LeHuy_Dev2`.`invoices`.`type`,`DigiERP_LeHuy_Dev2`.`invoices`.`status`

views.name: v_inventory_movements_summary
views.definition: select `im`.`id` AS `id`,`p`.`sku` AS `sku`,`p`.`name` AS `product_name`,`im`.`warehouse_id` AS `warehouse_id`,`im`.`movement_type` AS `movement_type`,`im`.`reference_type` AS `reference_type`,`im`.`reference_id` AS `reference_id`,`im`.`quantity` AS `quantity`,`im`.`unit_cost` AS `unit_cost`,`im`.`total_cost` AS `total_cost`,`im`.`notes` AS `notes`,`im`.`created_by` AS `created_by`,`im`.`created_at` AS `created_at` from (`DigiERP_LeHuy_Dev2`.`inventory_movements` `im` join `DigiERP_LeHuy_Dev2`.`products` `p` on((`im`.`product_id` = `p`.`id`))) order by `im`.`created_at` desc

views.name: v_inventory_summary
views.definition: select `i`.`id` AS `id`,`p`.`sku` AS `sku`,`p`.`name` AS `product_name`,`p`.`brand` AS `brand`,`i`.`warehouse_id` AS `warehouse_id`,`i`.`quantity_on_hand` AS `quantity_on_hand`,`i`.`quantity_reserved` AS `quantity_reserved`,`i`.`quantity_available` AS `quantity_available`,`i`.`reorder_point` AS `reorder_point`,`i`.`reorder_quantity` AS `reorder_quantity`,`i`.`status` AS `status`,(case when (`i`.`quantity_available` <= 0) then 'OUT_OF_STOCK' when (`i`.`quantity_available` <= `i`.`reorder_point`) then 'LOW_STOCK' else 'IN_STOCK' end) AS `calculated_status`,`i`.`created_at` AS `created_at`,`i`.`updated_at` AS `updated_at` from (`DigiERP_LeHuy_Dev2`.`inventory` `i` join `DigiERP_LeHuy_Dev2`.`products` `p` on((`i`.`product_id` = `p`.`id`)))

views.name: v_invoice_items_detail
views.definition: select `ii`.`id` AS `id`,`ii`.`invoice_id` AS `invoice_id`,`i`.`invoice_number` AS `invoice_number`,`i`.`type` AS `invoice_type`,`i`.`status` AS `invoice_status`,`i`.`customer_name` AS `customer_name`,`ii`.`product_id` AS `product_id`,`p`.`sku` AS `sku`,`ii`.`product_sku` AS `product_sku`,`ii`.`product_name` AS `product_name`,`p`.`brand` AS `brand`,`ii`.`description` AS `description`,`ii`.`quantity` AS `quantity`,`ii`.`unit` AS `unit`,`ii`.`unit_price` AS `unit_price`,`ii`.`discount_percentage` AS `discount_percentage`,`ii`.`discount_amount` AS `discount_amount`,`ii`.`tax_percentage` AS `tax_percentage`,`ii`.`tax_amount` AS `tax_amount`,`ii`.`total_amount` AS `total_amount`,`i`.`invoice_date` AS `invoice_date`,`i`.`due_date` AS `due_date` from ((`DigiERP_LeHuy_Dev2`.`invoice_items` `ii` join `DigiERP_LeHuy_Dev2`.`invoices` `i` on((`ii`.`invoice_id` = `i`.`id`))) left join `DigiERP_LeHuy_Dev2`.`products` `p` on((`ii`.`product_id` = `p`.`id`)))

views.name: v_invoice_summary
views.definition: select `i`.`id` AS `id`,`i`.`invoice_number` AS `invoice_number`,`i`.`type` AS `type`,`i`.`status` AS `status`,`i`.`customer_name` AS `customer_name`,`i`.`customer_email` AS `customer_email`,`i`.`order_number` AS `order_number`,`i`.`invoice_date` AS `invoice_date`,`i`.`due_date` AS `due_date`,`i`.`subtotal` AS `subtotal`,`i`.`tax_amount` AS `tax_amount`,`i`.`discount_amount` AS `discount_amount`,`i`.`total_amount` AS `total_amount`,`i`.`paid_amount` AS `paid_amount`,`i`.`balance_amount` AS `balance_amount`,`i`.`currency` AS `currency`,count(`ii`.`id`) AS `item_count`,sum(`ii`.`quantity`) AS `total_quantity`,`i`.`created_by` AS `created_by`,`i`.`created_at` AS `created_at`,`i`.`updated_at` AS `updated_at` from (`DigiERP_LeHuy_Dev2`.`invoices` `i` left join `DigiERP_LeHuy_Dev2`.`invoice_items` `ii` on((`i`.`id` = `ii`.`invoice_id`))) group by `i`.`id`

views.name: v_overdue_invoices
views.definition: select `DigiERP_LeHuy_Dev2`.`invoices`.`invoice_number` AS `invoice_number`,`DigiERP_LeHuy_Dev2`.`invoices`.`type` AS `type`,`DigiERP_LeHuy_Dev2`.`invoices`.`customer_name` AS `customer_name`,`DigiERP_LeHuy_Dev2`.`invoices`.`customer_email` AS `customer_email`,`DigiERP_LeHuy_Dev2`.`invoices`.`invoice_date` AS `invoice_date`,`DigiERP_LeHuy_Dev2`.`invoices`.`due_date` AS `due_date`,`DigiERP_LeHuy_Dev2`.`invoices`.`total_amount` AS `total_amount`,`DigiERP_LeHuy_Dev2`.`invoices`.`paid_amount` AS `paid_amount`,`DigiERP_LeHuy_Dev2`.`invoices`.`balance_amount` AS `balance_amount`,`DigiERP_LeHuy_Dev2`.`invoices`.`currency` AS `currency`,(to_days(curdate()) - to_days(`DigiERP_LeHuy_Dev2`.`invoices`.`due_date`)) AS `days_overdue` from `DigiERP_LeHuy_Dev2`.`invoices` where ((`DigiERP_LeHuy_Dev2`.`invoices`.`status` = 'OVERDUE') and (`DigiERP_LeHuy_Dev2`.`invoices`.`balance_amount` > 0)) order by (to_days(curdate()) - to_days(`DigiERP_LeHuy_Dev2`.`invoices`.`due_date`)) desc

views.name: v_sales_order_items_detail
views.definition: select `soi`.`id` AS `id`,`soi`.`order_id` AS `order_id`,`so`.`order_number` AS `order_number`,`so`.`customer_name` AS `customer_name`,`soi`.`product_id` AS `product_id`,`p`.`sku` AS `sku`,`soi`.`product_sku` AS `product_sku`,`soi`.`product_name` AS `product_name`,`p`.`brand` AS `brand`,`soi`.`quantity` AS `quantity`,`soi`.`unit` AS `unit`,`soi`.`unit_price` AS `unit_price`,`soi`.`discount_percentage` AS `discount_percentage`,`soi`.`discount_amount` AS `discount_amount`,`soi`.`line_total` AS `line_total`,`so`.`order_date` AS `order_date`,`so`.`status` AS `order_status`,`so`.`payment_status` AS `payment_status` from ((`DigiERP_LeHuy_Dev2`.`sales_order_items` `soi` join `DigiERP_LeHuy_Dev2`.`sales_orders` `so` on((`soi`.`order_id` = `so`.`id`))) join `DigiERP_LeHuy_Dev2`.`products` `p` on((`soi`.`product_id` = `p`.`id`)))

views.name: v_sales_orders_summary
views.definition: select `so`.`id` AS `id`,`so`.`order_number` AS `order_number`,`so`.`customer_name` AS `customer_name`,`so`.`customer_email` AS `customer_email`,`so`.`warehouse_id` AS `warehouse_id`,`so`.`status` AS `status`,`so`.`payment_status` AS `payment_status`,`so`.`subtotal` AS `subtotal`,`so`.`tax_amount` AS `tax_amount`,`so`.`discount_amount` AS `discount_amount`,`so`.`total_amount` AS `total_amount`,`so`.`currency` AS `currency`,`so`.`order_date` AS `order_date`,count(`soi`.`id`) AS `item_count`,sum(`soi`.`quantity`) AS `total_quantity`,`so`.`created_by` AS `created_by`,`so`.`created_at` AS `created_at`,`so`.`updated_at` AS `updated_at` from (`DigiERP_LeHuy_Dev2`.`sales_orders` `so` left join `DigiERP_LeHuy_Dev2`.`sales_order_items` `soi` on((`so`.`id` = `soi`.`order_id`))) group by `so`.`id`

views.name: v_sales_performance_by_product
views.definition: select `p`.`id` AS `product_id`,`p`.`sku` AS `sku`,`p`.`name` AS `product_name`,`p`.`brand` AS `brand`,count(`soi`.`id`) AS `order_count`,sum(`soi`.`quantity`) AS `total_quantity_sold`,sum(`soi`.`line_total`) AS `total_revenue`,avg(`soi`.`unit_price`) AS `avg_unit_price`,min(`soi`.`unit_price`) AS `min_unit_price`,max(`soi`.`unit_price`) AS `max_unit_price`,sum(`soi`.`discount_amount`) AS `total_discounts` from ((`DigiERP_LeHuy_Dev2`.`sales_order_items` `soi` join `DigiERP_LeHuy_Dev2`.`products` `p` on((`soi`.`product_id` = `p`.`id`))) join `DigiERP_LeHuy_Dev2`.`sales_orders` `so` on((`soi`.`order_id` = `so`.`id`))) where (`so`.`status` not in ('DRAFT','CANCELLED')) group by `p`.`id`,`p`.`sku`,`p`.`name`,`p`.`brand`

procedures.name: sp_GetCustomers
procedures.definition:
BEGIN
    DECLARE v_offset INT DEFAULT 0;
    
    SET v_offset = (p_page - 1) * p_limit;
    
    -- ─Éß║┐m tß╗òng sß╗æ records
    SELECT COUNT(*) INTO p_total
    FROM customers c
    LEFT JOIN cat_customer_groups cg ON c.customer_group_id = cg.id
    LEFT JOIN cat_customer_status cs ON c.status_id = cs.id
    LEFT JOIN users u ON c.sales_representative_id = u.id
    WHERE 
        (p_search IS NULL OR p_search = '' OR 
         c.code LIKE CONCAT('%', p_search, '%') OR
         c.name LIKE CONCAT('%', p_search, '%') OR
         c.tax_code LIKE CONCAT('%', p_search, '%') OR
         c.phone LIKE CONCAT('%', p_search, '%'))
        AND (p_customer_group_id IS NULL OR c.customer_group_id = p_customer_group_id)
        AND (p_sales_rep_id IS NULL OR c.sales_representative_id = p_sales_rep_id)
        AND (p_status_id IS NULL OR c.status_id = p_status_id)
        AND (p_customer_type IS NULL OR c.customer_type = p_customer_type);
    
    -- Lß║Ñy dß╗» liß╗çu vß╗¢i pagination
    SELECT 
        c.id,
        c.code,
        c.name,
        c.contact_person,
        c.email,
        c.phone,
        c.address,
        c.tax_code,
        c.customer_type,
        c.credit_limit,
        c.rating,
        c.total_orders,
        c.total_spent,
        c.last_order_date,
        c.is_active,
        c.created_at,
        c.updated_at,
        cg.id as group_id,
        cg.name as group_name,
        cg.color as group_color,
        cs.id as status_id,
        cs.name as status_name,
        cs.color as status_color,
        u.id as sales_rep_id,
        CONCAT(u.first_name, ' ', u.last_name) as sales_rep_name
    FROM customers c
    LEFT JOIN cat_customer_groups cg ON c.customer_group_id = cg.id
    LEFT JOIN cat_customer_status cs ON c.status_id = cs.id
    LEFT JOIN users u ON c.sales_representative_id = u.id
    WHERE 
        (p_search IS NULL OR p_search = '' OR 
         c.code LIKE CONCAT('%', p_search, '%') OR
         c.name LIKE CONCAT('%', p_search, '%') OR
         c.tax_code LIKE CONCAT('%', p_search, '%') OR
         c.phone LIKE CONCAT('%', p_search, '%'))
        AND (p_customer_group_id IS NULL OR c.customer_group_id = p_customer_group_id)
        AND (p_sales_rep_id IS NULL OR c.sales_representative_id = p_sales_rep_id)
        AND (p_status_id IS NULL OR c.status_id = p_status_id)
        AND (p_customer_type IS NULL OR c.customer_type = p_customer_type)
    ORDER BY c.created_at DESC
    LIMIT v_offset, p_limit;
END

procedures.name: sp_GetCustomerStatistics
procedures.definition:
BEGIN
    SELECT 
        'TOTAL_CUSTOMERS' as metric,
        COUNT(*) as value
    FROM customers
    WHERE is_active = TRUE
    
    UNION ALL
    
    SELECT 
        'COMPANY_CUSTOMERS' as metric,
        COUNT(*) as value
    FROM customers c
    WHERE c.is_active = TRUE AND c.customer_type = 'COMPANY'
    
    UNION ALL
    
    SELECT 
        'INDIVIDUAL_CUSTOMERS' as metric,
        COUNT(*) as value
    FROM customers c
    WHERE c.is_active = TRUE AND c.customer_type = 'INDIVIDUAL'
    
    UNION ALL
    
    SELECT 
        'CUSTOMER_GROUPS' as metric,
        COUNT(*) as value
    FROM cat_customer_groups
    WHERE is_active = TRUE;
END

procedures.name: sp_GetProductPrice_v2
procedures.definition:
BEGIN
    DECLARE v_price DECIMAL(15,2) DEFAULT 0;
    DECLARE v_price_type VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT 'STANDARD';
    DECLARE v_discount_pct DECIMAL(5,2) DEFAULT 0;
    DECLARE v_discount_amt DECIMAL(15,2) DEFAULT 0;
    DECLARE v_final_price DECIMAL(15,2) DEFAULT 0;
    DECLARE v_applied_price_id INT DEFAULT 0;
    DECLARE v_found BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE;

    -- 1) CONTRACT
    IF p_contract_id IS NOT NULL AND NOT v_found THEN
        SELECT price, price_type, COALESCE(discount_percentage,0), COALESCE(discount_amount,0), id
        INTO v_price, v_price_type, v_discount_pct, v_discount_amt, v_applied_price_id
        FROM product_prices
        WHERE product_id = p_product_id
          AND price_type = 'CONTRACT'
          AND contract_id = p_contract_id
          AND is_active = 1
          AND (valid_from IS NULL OR valid_from <= NOW())
          AND (valid_to IS NULL OR valid_to >= NOW())
        ORDER BY created_at DESC
        LIMIT 1;

        IF v_price > 0 THEN SET v_found = TRUE; END IF;
    END IF;

    -- 2) CUSTOMER
    IF p_customer_id IS NOT NULL AND NOT v_found THEN
        SELECT price, price_type, COALESCE(discount_percentage,0), COALESCE(discount_amount,0), id
        INTO v_price, v_price_type, v_discount_pct, v_discount_amt, v_applied_price_id
        FROM product_prices
        WHERE product_id = p_product_id
          AND price_type = 'CUSTOMER'
          AND customer_id = p_customer_id
          AND is_active = 1
          AND (valid_from IS NULL OR valid_from <= NOW())
          AND (valid_to IS NULL OR valid_to >= NOW())
        ORDER BY created_at DESC
        LIMIT 1;

        IF v_price > 0 THEN SET v_found = TRUE; END IF;
    END IF;

    -- 3) CUSTOMER_GROUP
    IF p_customer_group_id IS NOT NULL AND NOT v_found THEN
        SELECT price, price_type, COALESCE(discount_percentage,0), COALESCE(discount_amount,0), id
        INTO v_price, v_price_type, v_discount_pct, v_discount_amt, v_applied_price_id
        FROM product_prices
        WHERE product_id = p_product_id
          AND price_type = 'CUSTOMER_GROUP'
          AND customer_group_id = p_customer_group_id
          AND is_active = 1
          AND (valid_from IS NULL OR valid_from <= NOW())
          AND (valid_to IS NULL OR valid_to >= NOW())
        ORDER BY created_at DESC
        LIMIT 1;

        IF v_price > 0 THEN SET v_found = TRUE; END IF;
    END IF;

    -- 4) VOLUME
    IF p_quantity IS NOT NULL AND NOT v_found THEN
        SELECT price, price_type, COALESCE(discount_percentage,0), COALESCE(discount_amount,0), id
        INTO v_price, v_price_type, v_discount_pct, v_discount_amt, v_applied_price_id
        FROM product_prices
        WHERE product_id = p_product_id
          AND price_type = 'VOLUME'
          AND min_quantity <= p_quantity
          AND (max_quantity IS NULL OR max_quantity >= p_quantity)
          AND is_active = 1
          AND (valid_from IS NULL OR valid_from <= NOW())
          AND (valid_to IS NULL OR valid_to >= NOW())
        ORDER BY min_quantity DESC, created_at DESC
        LIMIT 1;

        IF v_price > 0 THEN SET v_found = TRUE; END IF;
    END IF;

    -- 5) STANDARD
    IF NOT v_found THEN
        SELECT price, price_type, COALESCE(discount_percentage,0), COALESCE(discount_amount,0), id
        INTO v_price, v_price_type, v_discount_pct, v_discount_amt, v_applied_price_id
        FROM product_prices
        WHERE product_id = p_product_id
          AND price_type = 'STANDARD'
          AND is_active = 1
          AND (valid_from IS NULL OR valid_from <= NOW())
          AND (valid_to IS NULL OR valid_to >= NOW())
        ORDER BY created_at DESC
        LIMIT 1;
    END IF;

    -- discount: percentage overrides amount
    IF v_discount_pct > 0 THEN
        SET v_discount_amt = ROUND(v_price * v_discount_pct / 100, 2);
    END IF;

    SET v_final_price = GREATEST(0, v_price - v_discount_amt);

    SELECT 
        v_price AS price,
        v_price_type AS price_type,
        v_discount_amt AS discount_amount,
        v_final_price AS final_price,
        v_applied_price_id AS applied_price_id;
END
